param.name: args.reveal.theme
param.desc: Theme used for the Reveal slides

param.name: args.reveal.css
param.desc: Path to custom reveal.js CSS

param.name: args.reveal.controls
param.desc: Display controls in the bottom right corner.

param.name: args.reveal.progress
param.desc: Display a presentation progress bar.

param.name: args.reveal.slidenumber
param.desc: Display the page number of the current slide.

param.name: args.reveal.history
param.desc: Push each slide change to the browser history.

param.name: args.reveal.keyboard
param.desc: Enable keyboard shortcuts for navigation.

param.name: args.reveal.overview
param.desc: Enable the slide overview mode.

param.name: args.reveal.center
param.desc: Vertical centering of slides.

param.name: args.reveal.touch
param.desc: Enables touch navigation on devices with touch input.

param.name: args.reveal.loop
param.desc: Loop the presentation.

param.name: args.reveal.rtl
param.desc: Change the presentation direction to be right-to-left.

param.name: args.reveal.fragments
param.desc: Turns fragments on and off globally.

param.name: args.reveal.embedded
param.desc: Flags if the presentation is running in an embedded mode, i.e. contained within a limited portion of the screen.

param.name: args.reveal.autoslide
param.desc: Number of milliseconds between automatically proceeding to the next slide, disabled when set to 0, this value can be overwritten by using a data-autoslide attribute on your slides

param.name: args.reveal.autoslidestoppable
param.desc: Stop auto-sliding after user input.

param.name: args.reveal.mousewheel
param.desc: Enable slide navigation via mouse wheel.

param.name: args.reveal.hideaddressbar
param.desc: Hides the address bar on mobile devices.

param.name: args.reveal.previewlinks
param.desc: Opens links in an iframe preview overlay.

param.name: args.reveal.transition
param.desc: Set the transition style.

param.name: args.reveal.transitionspeed
param.desc: Set the transition speed.

param.name: args.reveal.backgroundtransition
param.desc: Transition style for full page slide backgrounds.

param.name: args.reveal.viewdistance
param.desc: Set the number of slides away from the current that are visible.

param.name: args.reveal.parallaxbackgroundimage
param.desc: Set the parallax background image.

param.name: args.reveal.parallaxbackgroundsize
param.desc: Parallax background size. CSS syntax, e.g. '2100px 900px'

param.name: args.reveal.width
param.desc: The 'normal' width of the presentation, aspect ratio will be preserved when the presentation is scaled to fit different resolutions. Can be specified using percentage units.

param.name: args.reveal.height
param.desc: The 'normal' height of the presentation, aspect ratio will be preserved when the presentation is scaled to fit different resolutions. Can be specified using percentage units.

param.name: args.reveal.margin
param.desc: Factor of the display size that should remain empty around the content.

param.name: args.reveal.minScale
param.desc: Bounds for smallest possible scale to apply to content.

param.name: args.reveal.maxScale
param.desc: Bounds for largest possible scale to apply to content.

param.name: args.reveal.generate.vertical.slides
param.desc: Generate vertical slides for level 2 and below references.
